Bio

I am a EUROfusion Researcher Grant recipient and postdoctoral researcher at the Max-Planck-Institut für Plasmphysik in Greifswald, Germany as a member of the Stellarator Theory group. My research focuses on developing numerical methods for plasma fluid turbulence simulation in non-axisymmetric geometries using the BOUT++ framework.
